variants.name: Breakout Classic
variants.flavor_text: Break all the bricks! Classic paddle and ball action

variants.name: Breakout Easy Mode
variants.flavor_text: Wide paddle, slow ball, fewer bricks - perfect for beginners

variants.name: Breakout Hardcore
variants.flavor_text: Tiny paddle, fast ball, reinforced bricks. Good luck.

variants.name: Breakout Multi-Ball Madness
variants.flavor_text: Three balls at once! Track them all or lose them all

variants.name: Breakout Tower
variants.flavor_text: Towering wall of 8 rows. Clear it brick by brick

variants.name: Breakout Gravity Falls
variants.flavor_text: Ball falls like it's real! Master the arcing physics

variants.name: Breakout Side Gravity
variants.flavor_text: Gravity pulls sideways! Ball curves right constantly

variants.name: Breakout Homing Missile
variants.flavor_text: Ball homes in on bricks! Watch it curve toward targets

variants.name: Breakout Phase Blast
variants.flavor_text: Ball pierces 3 bricks before bouncing! Clear clusters fast

variants.name: Breakout Speed Demon
variants.flavor_text: Ball accelerates +20 per brick! Gets insanely fast

variants.name: Breakout Ice Rink
variants.flavor_text: Slippery paddle slides on ice! Master the momentum
